body_html:
Tried in a docker container,
If we install 'locate' instead of 'mlocate', locate can run but it wasn't able to find "libdl.so.2".

What worked was:
Keep "apt-get install mlocate", then run "updatedb" after the installation to populate the database.

@vivek-rane could you add "updatedb" to the same file as well? Thanks!

body:
Tried in a docker container, 
If we install 'locate' instead of 'mlocate', locate can run but it wasn't able to find "libdl.so.2".

What worked was:
Keep "apt-get install mlocate", then run "updatedb" after the installation to populate the database.

@vivek-rane could you add "updatedb" to the same file as well? Thanks!
